contact.text: Feel free to reach out to me via WhatsApp or email. I'm ready to discuss your projects, answer your questions, and explore collaboration opportunities. Let's build something extraordinary together!

metatags.title: Ygor Mendanha - YM Development
metatags.description: Portfolio of a code enthusiast and innovator showcasing exceptional digital creations.

digitalIdeasIntoResults: I turn digital ideas into real results for your business.
ecommerceErpExpert: Specialist in e-commerce, ERP systems, and custom solutions for companies looking to sell more and manage better.
introYgor: I am Ygor Mendanha, a developer with experience in e-commerce, ERP, and custom projects.
recentExperience: In recent years, I have collaborated with companies in the audiovisual, vehicle tracking, and digital commerce sectors, creating solutions that increase sales, optimize processes, and strengthen the brand.
servicesSummary: If you are looking for an online store that converts, an efficient internal system, or an impactful event page, you are in the right place.
ecommerceDescription: I create fast, secure, and optimized online stores to turn visitors into customers, focusing on conversion and user experience.
erpAutomationDescription: I develop custom solutions that automate processes, simplify business management, and increase team productivity.
landingPagesDescription: I create impactful pages to attract, engage, and generate results for campaigns, events, or product launches.

descFinesse: E-commerce built with Next.js, Tailwind, and PostgreSQL. It supports product registration, dynamic cart, and optimized checkout. The challenge was to create a fast and scalable store to simulate a real customer experience. My solution included a responsive front end, robust backend, and secure purchase flow. The demo store showcases how I structure modern e-commerce solutions, reducing load times and improving user experience.
titleNotes: Notes App â€“ Note Taking Application
descNotes: Web app for personal notes, with login and database persistence. Developed with Next.js, Tailwind, and PostgreSQL. Its main strength is simplicity and productivity, with a clear and secure interface. The result is a tool adaptable for companies or personal use, ensuring efficient organization.
descBot: Bot built for Telegram using Python and an integrated database. It allows users to register expenses, set goals, and generate daily/monthly reports. The goal was to automate financial control in a simple way. The impact is saving time and making expense tracking accessible on any device.
descriptionBlog: Articles about technology, web development, and my experiences as a developer, sharing ideas, lessons learned, and insights.
